4.6 Non-Permanence Risk Analysis

Not applicable.

VERIFICATION CONCLUSION

4K Earth Science Pvt. Ltd (4KES), contracted by ‘AERA Group’, has performed the independent verification of the emission reductions for the VCS project activity (VCS ID - 1522) “Soubré hydropower project” in Céte d'Ivoire for the monitoring period 01-July-2022 to 30-June-2023 as reported in the Monitoring Report Version 1.3 dated 15/02/2024. CI-ENERGIES are responsible for the collection of data in accordance with the monitoring plan and the reporting of GHG emissions reductions from the project activity. It is our responsibility to express an independent verification statement on the reported GHG emission reductions from the project activity.

AKES commenced the verification on the basis of the baseline and monitoring methodology ACMO002- Version 16.0, the monitoring plan contained in the registered VCS PD /05/, VCS guidelines version 4.4 and Monitoring Report (Version 1.3 dated 15/02/2024) as per the process described under Section 2 of this report.

AKES verification approach is based on the understanding of the risks associated with reporting of GHG emission data and the controls in place to mitigate these. 4KES planned and performed the verification by obtaining evidence and other information and explanations that AKES considered necessary to give reasonable assurance that reported GHG emission reductions are fairly stated.
